amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Overseas Private Investment Corporation by $11.2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 13 in the Congressional Record of July 15, 1997, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Overseas Private Investment Corporation by $11.2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 272 (Roll no. 346).
